original_text: the person who touches such a thing shall be unclean until the evening and shall not eat of the holy things unless he has bathed his body in water.
korean_text: 곧 이런 것에 접촉된 자는 저녁까지 부정하니 그의 몸을 물로 씻지 아니하면 그 성물을 먹지 못할지며

sentences.original_text: the person who touches such a thing
shall be unclean until the evening
and shall not eat of the holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거룩한 것을 먹지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: unless he has bathed his body in water
